James is a 28-year-old accountant that earns <span class='green3'>RM 7000 monthly</span>. He spent all his salary on <span class='red3'>luxuries</span> and maxed out on <span class='red3'>credit cards</span>. He even took up loan to finance <span class='red3'>overseas trip, luxurious car and expensive house</span>. One day, his mother is diagnosed with <span class='red3'>cancer</span> and needs a huge amount of medical expenses. <span class='yellow'>Without any savings, investment or insurance</span>, can he get by his <span class='red3'>current situation</span>? Can he even plan for his <span class='blue3'>retirement</span>?
  
<div style='text-align: center;'>
![](james.png)
</div>


## Overview
<span class='red3'>FiNap</span> is the solution for <span class='red3'>young working adults</span> like James. By planning ahead of time, young working adults can manage their personal finance, have ample savings for <span class='red3'>emergency situations</span> and plan for a <span class='red3'>prosperous retirement life</span>.
  
<div style='text-align: center;'>
![](retirementPyramid.png)
</div>

## App Input

FiNap allows users to input data like <span class='red3'>income, saving, investment, expense, house loan, car loan</span> and <span class='red3'>child education cost</span>.

## Projection

FiNap <span class='red3'>projects</span> users' <span class='red3'>future income</span> and <span class='red3'>expenses</span> which allow users to see their <span class='red3'>net worth at the age of retirement</span>.
